    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>54179de100c090d7cdd69566a0b2553c3079970c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Mida teeb? Mida teevad? 2. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">What and Who</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was und wer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui et qui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que e quem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa e chi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι και ποιοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué y quién</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õpetaja tunnikava koos töölehega I kooliastme 2. klassile. Tegusõna muutmine. Elektrooniline tööleht: õppida klaviatuuril trükkimist ja sõnade lohistamist.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan for a teacher with a worksheet for the 1st stage of study, form 2. Changing the verb. Electronic worksheet: learn how to drag words and print.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan für einen Lehrer mit einem Bogen 
für das 1. Stadium der Studie, Formular 2. Ändern des Verbs. 
Elektronischer Bogen: erlernen Sie, wie man Wörter 
schleppt und druckt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon pour un professeur avec un tableau
pour la 1ère étape de l'étude, forme 2. Changer le verbe. 
Tableau électronique : apprenez comment traîner des mots
et imprimer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição para um professor com uma folha
para o 1o estágio do estudo, formulário 2. Mudando o verbo. 
Folha eletrônica: aprenda como arrastar palavras e 
imprimi-las.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione per un insegnante con un 
foglio di lavoro per la prima fase dello studio, forma 2. 
Cambiare il verbo. Foglio di lavoro elettronico: 
impari come trascinare le parole e stampare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο μαθήματος για έναν δάσκαλο με ένα φύλλο 
εργασίας για το 1$ο στάδιο της μελέτης, διαμορφώνει 2. 
μεταβαλλόμενος το ρήμα. Ηλεκτρονικό φύλλο εργασίας: 
μάθετε πώς να σέρει τις λέξεις και την τυπωμένη ύλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección para un profesor con una hoja
de trabajo para la 1ra etapa del estudio, forma 2. Cambiar el 
verbo. Hoja de trabajo electrónica: aprenda cómo 
arrastrar palabras e imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua estonian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό σχολείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσθονική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
